page.title: 16Entertainment Survey
page.content: We made a survey of the children in the Junior department of Pembrey School, to find out how many families owned T.V.s, videos etc. These are our findings: 100% one or more T.V.s 88% radios 70% cassette recorders 60% stereo units 51% videos Many children have T.V.s in their bedrooms as well as in their living rooms. All watch T.V. programmes for hours everyday. In school we have two T.V.s. The Infant Department uses the T.V. most days. Some Junior classes watch T.V. programmes. The radio and cassette recorders are often used.
